attributes.action: The council to place a tribute fan bench for George Michael in Hampstead Heath.
attributes.additional_details:
George Michael loved Hampstead Heath park so much. It was his favourite park and he would often go there for some time to himself.
I now want to pay further tribute to George Michael with your kind support.

Can you please help by signing this petition? 

We need huge numbers to get the government to notice our home grown talent who much deserves it.
attributes.background:
To get City Of London to place a commemorative bench to pay tribute to George Michael who suddenly passed away on Christmas day for his fans only. His Fans will love this and will agree to it.
It's the least they can do as this was his favourite and local park. I'm sure his family will love it too.

rejection.details:
Hampstead Heath is the responsibility of the City of London, not the Government or Parliament. 

You can find out how to contact the City of London's Hampstead Heath Consultative Committee here:

http://democracy.cityoflondon.gov.uk/ieListMeetings.aspx?CId=261&Year=0
